segments.text: Over on the other side of the kitchen, some serious mischief is afoot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A young boy is scaling a precarious-looking stool to reach an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, I can clearly see a large jar labeled “COOKIE JAR” bursting with treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little hand is already deep inside, pulling out what I assume are cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His accomplice, a girl, stands below, arm outstretched in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a coordinated effort they've got going on there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, I'm almost surprised it hasn't tipped yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a little happy for their cleverness in getting to the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their mission, completely ignoring everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene really highlights the stealthy nature of childhood desires.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they manage to get some delicious snacks without falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a bold move, right under the nose of the adult.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic secret cookie raid.
segments.speaker: PAR
